00043 #ifndef MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_HEADER_INCLUDED
00044 #define MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_HEADER_INCLUDED
00045 
00046 #include <algorithm>
00047 #include <mat_ops.H>
00048 #include <math_basics.H>
00049 #include <Quaternion.H>
00050 
00051 namespace SimSite3D{
00052 
00053   typedef enum{
00054     MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_NULL,
00055     MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_GREW 
00056   }my_float_array_push_back_return_type;
00057 
00059   class my_float_array{
00060   public:
00061 
00063     my_float_array(uint init_num_pts = 10, uint stride_in = 3);
00064 
00066     my_float_array(const my_float_array& src)
00067     {
00068       init();
00069       do_copy(src);
00070     }
00071 
00074     const my_float_array&
00075     operator=(const my_float_array& src)
00076     {
00077       if(this != &src){
00078         if(orig) delete[] orig;
00079         if(curr) delete[] curr;
00080         if(scratch) delete[] scratch;
00081         init();
00082 
00083         do_copy(src);
00084       }
00085       return *this;
00086     }
00087 
00089     ~my_float_array();
00090 
00091     uint 
00092     size() const
00093     { return (curr_end - curr) / _stride; }
00094 
00095     uint
00096     stride() const
00097     { return _stride; }
00098                                                                                 
00099     uint
00100     reserved() const
00101     { return _reserved; }
00102 
00103     my_float_t*
00104     begin() const
00105     { return curr; }
00106   
00107     my_float_t*
00108     end() const
00109     { return curr_end; }
00110 
00112 
00118     my_float_array_push_back_return_type
00119     push_back(const my_float_t* el)
00120     {
00121       my_float_array_push_back_return_type rv = MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_NULL;
00122       if(curr_end - curr >= _reserved){
00123         double_reserve();
00124         rv = MY_FLOAT_ARRAY_GREW;
00125       }
00126       std::copy(el, el + _stride, curr_end);
00127 
00128       curr_end += _stride;
00129       return rv;
00130     }
00131 
00133 
00146     void transform3D(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00147     {
00148       if(_stride != 3) return; // no desire to code up something other than 3x3
00149       int z_max = curr_end - curr;
00150       if(z_max > (orig_end - orig)) update_orig_pts();
00151     
00152       std::copy(curr, curr_end, scratch);
00153       for(my_float_t *p = curr; p < curr_end; p+=3) std::copy(T, T+3, p);
00154       my_gemm(z_max/_stride, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R, 3, curr, 3, 1.0);
00155     }
00156 
00158 
00160     void inverse_transform3D(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00161     {
00162       if(_stride != 3) return; // no desire to code up something other than 3x3
00163       int z_max = curr_end - curr;
00164       if(z_max > (orig_end - orig)) update_orig_pts();
00165 
00166       my_float_t R_transpose[9];
00167       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00168         for(int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) R_transpose[3*j + i] = R[3*i + j];
00169 
00170       my_float_t T_inverse[3];
00171       for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) T_inverse[i] = -1.0 * T[i];
00172       my_float_t* scratch_end = scratch + z_max;
00173       for(my_float_t *p = scratch; p < scratch_end; p+=3) 
00174         std::copy(T_inverse, T_inverse+3, p);
00175       my_axpy(z_max, 1.0, curr, 1, scratch, 1);
00176     
00177       my_gemm(z_max/_stride, 3, 3, 1.0, scratch, 3, R_transpose, 3, curr, 3, 
00178               0.0);
00179     }
00180                                                                                 
00182     void 
00183     revert()
00184     {
00185       // Really shouldn't ever run this here, but it is better to insure
00186       // that we don't core dump (or would it be better to core dump and know
00187       // that someone pushed additional values after a transformation was
00188       // applied? )
00189       if((curr_end - curr) > (orig_end - orig)) update_orig_pts();
00190       std::copy(orig, orig_end, curr);
00191     }
00192 
00194 
00199     void
00200     set_current_values_as_original()
00201     {
00202       if(orig) delete [] orig;
00203       orig = 0;
00204       orig_end = 0;
00205     }
00206 
00208     const bool 
00209     centroid_3D(my_float_t* C) const;
00210 
00213 
00218     inline void 
00219     get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Quaternion *Q, my_float_t *T) const
00220     {
00221       lse_3D_fit(orig, curr,  (orig_end - orig) / 3, Q, T);
00222     }
00223 
00226     my_float_t
00227     compute_RMSD() const
00228     {
00229       my_float_t my_sum = 0.0;
00230       const my_float_t *C = curr;
00231       for(const my_float_t *O = orig; O < orig_end; ++O, ++C){
00232         my_float_t tmp = *O - *C;
00233         my_sum += tmp*tmp;
00234       }
00235       size_t npts = (orig_end - orig) / 3;
00236       return std::sqrt(my_sum / npts) ;
00237     }
00238 
00239   private:
00240     void 
00241     init();
00242 
00244     void double_reserve();
00245 
00247     void update_orig_pts();
00248 
00251     void do_copy(const my_float_array& src);
00252 
00253     uint _stride;
00254     int _reserved;
00255     my_float_t* orig;      
00256     my_float_t* orig_end;  
00257     my_float_t* curr;      
00258     my_float_t* curr_end;  
00259     my_float_t* scratch;  
00260   };
00261 }
00262 
00263 #endif
